greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Restricted growth sequence transform of A297156, which is Möbius transform of A243354.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
program: rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
A064989(n) = {my(f); f = factor(n); if((n>1 && f[1,1]==2), f[1,2] = 0); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1)); factorback(f)};
A006068(n)= { my(s=1, ns); while(1, ns = n >> s; if(0==ns, break()); n = bitxor(n, ns); s <<= 1; ); return (n); } \\ Essentially _Joerg Arndt_'s Jul 19 2012 code.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 28 2017
